# gcore_project (Data Source)

Represent project data

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider gcore {
  permanent_api_token = "251$d3361.............1b35f26d8"
}

data "gcore_project" "pr" {
  name = "test"
}
```

- `name` (String) Displayed project name
